entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, a student who is tempted by a model of the galaxy and a new broom.

entities.name: leaky cauldron
entities.description: A place where Harry stays after arriving in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: quality quidditch supplies
entities.description: A shop that sells Quidditch equipment, including the new broom.

entities.name: irish international side
entities.description: A team of wizards who have ordered seven of the new brooms.

relationships.description: Harry arrived at the Leaky Cauldron after his arrival in Diagon Alley.
Harry visited Quality Quidditch Supplies to see what the crowd was staring at.
The Irish International Side ordered seven of the new brooms from Quality Quidditch Supplies.
